Class CustomAction

java.lang.Object

      es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.chapter.CustomAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
Documented, HasTargetId, Named, Cloneable
public class CustomAction
extends Action
implements Named

An customizable action that can be done during the game

Author:
Eugenio Marchiori

Constructor with conditions and effects, for actions that only need one object

Parameters:
type - the type of the action
conditions - the conditions of the action
effects - the effects of the action
notEffects - The effects of the action when the conditions aren't OK (must not be null)
